topic.title: ZeroNet stopped working and there were 0 trackers
topic.body: What's the point of this ZeroNet when it can get blocked? I was unable to connect to any trackers for a week until I changed my proxy. Everything was working fine until I accessed 08chan after which things went to shit and I couldn't connect to any trackers. Anyone else experienced a similar problem?

1565913377_17dcwh1uMFnDMZK8X5XHciXFggdxV.body: Too true. You know why you have to wait until they are at least 18? Because by that time they discover the value of money and instead of getting a husband they can play around or sell sexual services in exchange for money.

> [223556](#comment_134_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1nWFu9): Reminder, pedos are-lower iq-manlets, 2.5 cm below average, double the effect from smoking while pregnant-left handed (gay)-uglyhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EeJxkwrUwAA

I guess now we know why the English are left handed. :O

1565806779_1PA19ZVGt9k6GEX2mYAF6w5zJCPYK.body: ZeroNet is buggy as fuck, I couldn't access anything for a week until I tried changing my proxy.
